mapper.update: insert all into pj(pj_no, pj_name, pj_content, pj_creator, pj_start_date, pj_end_date) values (pj_seq.nextval, #{pj_name}, #{pj_content}, #{pj_creator}, #{pj_start_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{pj_end_date, jdbcType=DATE}) into pj_file(pj_file_no, pj_no, save_filename, original_filename) values (pj_file_seq.nextval, pj_seq.currval, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) select*from dual
